entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT: Inline static initialization checks in codegen #80954
    Future
  • [Mono] Enhance ILStrip to be capable of trimming away a single method #80953
    8.0.0
  • Lacking performance of `StringBuilder.Replace` #80952
  • AccessViolation in SystemDomain::LoadBaseSystemClasses in Single File Application #80943
  • Mono AOT full program analyses and interprocedural optimizations #80942
    Future
  • Optimizing generics by using ILCompiler dependency graph and profile guided optimization in Mono AOT #80941
    8.0.0
  • Mono AOT size savings in .NET 8 #80938
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Stand up JavaScriptCore wasm testing and benchmarks #80936
    8.0.0
  • [Android] Deserialization issue when consuming ASMX Web Service #80935
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT/osx-arm64] Warnings publishing classlib with `StripSymbols=true` #80934
  • Memory leak in JsonSerializer.DeserializeAsyncEnumerable when constructors are used #80933
  • Getting errors while running dotnet/performance (https://github.com/dotnet/performance) benchmark with mono #80922
  • CodeDom - CodeTypeReference - Invalid VB output for List<int>[] #80921
  • Potential size reduction opportunities in System.Text.Json NativeAOT #80917
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Dataflow SourceBlock<T> #80915
  • Regression with JsonConverter attribute with Syste.Text.Json 7 #80914
    7.0.x
  • Static registrar with NativeAOT design – discussion #80912
    8.0.0
  • HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT #80911
    8.0.0
  • Enable AppleAppBuilder to bundle applications compiled with NativeAOT #80910
    8.0.0
  • Support targeting iOS platforms with ILCompiler #80908
    8.0.0
  • Investigate limitations and document findings of enabling NativeAOT for MAUI iOS application #80907
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT on iOS as an experimental feature in .NET8 #80905
    8.0.0
  • Consider using WebAssembly JavaScript Promise Integration API (JSPI) for sync-over-async scenarios #80904
    Future
  • Add support to blake2 and blake3 cryptographic hash functions #80900
    Future
  • dotnet-dump in container doesn't work due to ptrace restriction #80898
    8.0.0
  • Not able to access External server from inside container #80897

Closed

  • [Mono] System.Reflection.Metadata.Tests.MetadataReaderTests.GetAssemblyName is failing #80863
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/pauseonstart/pauseonstart/pauseonstart.sh #80594
    8.0.0
  • ValueTask.ConfigureAwait(false) may resume execution on a random synchronization context #71313
    Future
  • `System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow` tests timing out on `coreclr Linux_musl arm` #71475
    Future
  • Dispatcher.Invoke() slows down Parallel.For performances on .NET 6 #73001
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Provide a result returning Parallel.ForEachAsync overload #72489
    Future
  • Task.Run randomly fails when using ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow #76297
    Future
  • NullReferenceException in LoggerFactory #80902
    Future
  • Microsoft.DotNet.CoreSetup.Test.HostActivation tests failing in CI #75429
    8.0.0
  • [System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow] Dataflow unreliably completes before processing all items #78772
  • Add method to avoid TaskScheduler.UnobservedTaskException for a given Task #23878
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Threading.Tests.Perf_Timer #79409
  • Large memory allocation using System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow #80080
  • [API Proposal]: Change visibility of ComWrappers.GetIUnknownImpl to public #80451
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support getting IUnknown for ComWrappers RCWs #79679
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add ability to safely get the managed object from a ComWrappers CCW #79674
    8.0.0
  • Reading all bytes from CryptoStream does not trigger TransformFinalBlock if stream length is a multiple of transform block size #76948
    Future
  • Can't validate CMS signature in .NET 6/7, works in .NET 4.8 #78453
  • RegexOptions.NonBacktracking producing wrong matches with loops and contextual nullability #79116
    8.0.0
  • The .NET 6 breaking change of `FileStream.Position` in async I/O is not exhibited. #80926
  • Simply language tag, with only language code and without country or region code, are not recognized for currency symbol #80906
  • Update .NET 8 Unicode data to version 15.0.0 #75711
    8.0.0
  • Category name should be deduced when injecting ILogger #80895
  • SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer round trips to domain controller to map client certificate to user when domain joined #78350
    8.0.0
  • Add support to Argon2d, Argon2i and Argon2id #80899
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-alpha.1.23067.5 ] When second parameter is bool for Enum.ToObject() method, it throws System.ArgumentException: 'The value passed in must be an enum base or an underlying type for an enum, such as an Int32.' exception #80890
  • [release/6.0] Close MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources (#75521) #80623
    6.0.x
  • Boost performance of localized, non-static or incremental string formatting. #50330
    8.0.0
  • Linux: System.IO.Ports.SerialPort does not open with baudrate 111,865 #80288
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] *all* `perf` microbenchmarks crashing with AOT+v8 #80834
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update StaticFilterOptionsMonitor.cs #80959
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: reset max bbnum after failed inline attempt #80958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove presumably-useless? serializability checks #80957
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix generic parameter data flow validation in NativeAOT #80956
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • WASM Toolchain Support for ARM64 #80955
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [mono][loader] Set status on success #80951
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [mono][loader] Set status on success #80949
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Make sure we specify arguments only when the test ask for it #80947
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Continuation] - Enable the fundamentals behind libraries tests compiled via Crossgen2 #80946
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Disable a couple of coreclr test for unloadability testing #80945
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Set `TrimMode=full` for tests #80944
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Change the default trimmode here too #80940
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Target lower glibc for Linux arm64 #80939
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add expected output tests for regex source generator #80937
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Handle Span<T>.Length and ReadOnlySpan<T>.Length as intrinsic #80932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add SYSLIB* analyzers to global configs #80930
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix function pointer check #80927
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [Android] Add an AzDO pipeline to run tests on emulators running all supported Android API levels #80925
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Android] Bump target SDK version in Android manifest #80923
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Allow forced building of mobile manifest pkgs, outside mobile builds #80920
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][aot] Emit native-to-managed wrappers for [UnmanagedCallersOnly… #80918
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm] Guard leading/trailing zero count #80913
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Android] Add option to skip generating apk for a specific project #80909
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][aot] Skip codegen of non-generic methods in dedup-include mode. #80903
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Inline resource strings in the compiler #80896
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Error out if the linker is not enabled in AOT mode. #80894
    area-Build-mono
  • Create skeleton for the ComInterfaceGenerator #80887
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Fold some expressions early in importer #80888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make GetAssemblyName test more robust. #80878
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Remove TEST_ProcessInfoBeforeAndAfterSuspension #80889
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Strip all symbols on macOS as well #80515
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: have inliner use fgSplitBlockAfterStatement #80928
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Append version to RID only with valid characters #80901
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Suppress more managed TypeReference warnings-as-errors #80931
  • Implement new `ComWrappers` APIs #80402
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Expand AreUpper32BitsZero checks to take into account more instructions #80892
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix regex analyzers category to be "Performance" rather than "GeneratedRegex" #80919
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fixes for NonBacktracking with some combinations of loops and anchors #80880
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove the second type parameter from CastingConverter #80755
    area-System.Text.Json, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • JIT: build pred lists before object allocation phase #80891
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support Unicode 15 #80804
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Replace bit shifting with Avx2.Permute4x64 #80830
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Disable user mapper for SslStream on Windows #80886
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows
  • Remove per-context delegate allocations in netcoreapp targets #80517
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Shave ~90K off regex in native aot #80884
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, size-reduction
  • Fix Enum.ToObject for bool to Enum #80893
  • [mono][wasm] Fix an llvm assert. #80844
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, needs-author-action
  • Add System.Text.CompositeFormat #80753
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Update spmi asp.net script #80882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid TypeSpec resolution when checking for IsValueType #80842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • allow to set custom serial speed on Linux #80534
    os-linux, area-System.IO.Ports
  • Fix TargetOS value `linux` instead of `Unix` #80794
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase.Compare perf #80813
  • Fix single method compilation for shared generics #80864
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: build pred lists before the eh opt phases #80856
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Change the default loop unroll limit to 4 #80353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Count #80662
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Copy local intellisense xmls for assemblies with source of truth. #79134
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove "promoted struct death vars" map #80501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Assign correct slots for open generic service descriptors during IEnumerable resolution #80410
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Final removal of uses of Windows wide char printing #80758
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fold `static readonly VectorX` to GT_CNS_VEC #80670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Ensure various scalar cross platform helper APIs are handled directly as intrinsic #80789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] Fix nested non-byref like VC with no pointer fields #80873
    Servicing-approved, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.4
  • [EXPERIMENTAL - will be reverted] Opt-in for msbuild server in CI #79444
  • [release/7.0] Correctly handle HFA structs when crossgen'd on Arm64 #80881
    Servicing-consider, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Correctly handle HFA structs when crossgen'd on Arm64 #80872
    Servicing-consider, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Support use of fast-path serialization in combined JsonSerializerContexts. #80741
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Conditionally disable `--allow-undefined` #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Use newer ubuntu 20.04 images #80808
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Update suppressions now that netframework facade has forwards #79465
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Mono] Fix function pointer check #80855
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Enable CA1859 - Use concrete types when possible for improved performance #80848
  • Split TryRead implementation into TryPopulate and TryCreateObject #79659
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0] Allow retaining the original casing for known header values #80754
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range(...).ToArray() #80633
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Harden and re-enable DualMode socket tests #80715
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Fix HttpStress & SslStress #80713
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono][interp] Ensure call offset is greater than offset of other active calls #80728
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Close MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources #80785
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Quic, 6.0.x
  • Improve Http2Connection buffer management #79484
    area-System.Net.Http, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0][browser] improve default initial memory size #80849
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • [browser] improve default initial memory size #80507
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-20
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: merge PR 67238 - JIT: Refactor call argument representation #2177

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Not able to access File server from inside container running Asp.Net 4.7.2 window service #30045
  • Rationalize short and long RIDs #30041

Closed

  • `dotnet publish` shows garbled characters when running on PMC on OS with Traditional Chinese language #29151
    Backlog
  • dotnet cli produces `?`s in output #8833
    Backlog
  • .NET 8: [breaking] dotnet build/publish produces RID-specific apps by default #23540
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30061
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30060
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port two better fixes for installer crashes from main #30057
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix NRE in installer tests #30056
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #30049
    Area-Infrastructure
  • update output path in WebProjectsTests #30048
    Area-dotnet new
  • Prevent editors from auto-trimming trailing whitespaces in test approval files #30044
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding the linux feed removal to 6.0.1xx as I figured out the issue #30037
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Bump sdk container version #30036
    7.0.2xx
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29990
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use UTF-8 Encoding by Default On Windows On Non English Languages #29755
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a reminder for the Area-AspNetCore PR authors to help with finding the schedule #29749
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add support for destructor and explicit interface implementation generation. #30030
    Area-GenAPI
  • Create an SDK PR guide #29562
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Mention that preview SDKs in VS needs to be turned on in the dev guide #29870
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [gh-23135] use parent path of manifest file path as rootConfigDirectory #24935
    Area-CLI
  • Move Template Discovery Test from dotnet/templating to dotnet/sdk #29628
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use Runtime ILLink package on SDK #29983
    Area-ILLink, DO NOT MERGE

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    11.0
  • Proposal: Ternary comparison operator #4108
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: [call local static functions in base constructor] #3980
    Any Time
  • Expand lambdas and method body definitions to allow any block like statements #6887

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add roles spec covering static extensions #6880

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Needless exceptions being thrown while processing XML doc comments for quick info in LSIF #66503
    17.6
  • Intellisense generates incorrect cref in XML docs when method has ValueTuple parameters #66502
  • Test failed in CI: Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.CSharp.UnitTests.Classification.TotalClassifierTests.DynamicInPartialMethods(testHost: OutOfProcess) #66500
  • Unexpected "Parameter is unread" warning for record primary constructor parameter #66495
    Backlog

Closed

  • Extension method for object suggested on experssion evaluated to void #65020
    17.5
  • Explicit type preference is missing in code cleanup in 17.4.0 preview 3 #66472
  • Unexpected value 'include' in azure-pipelines-integration.yml #64548
    17.5
  • Missing suggestions after `file` keyword #66319
    17.6
  • Source Generators: Post-build event #66491
  • What is the best approach to create diagnostic which relies on symbol references? #66100
  • Assertion in nullable walker in speculation on switch expression #65061
    17.6
  • Possible bug: TypedReference* (and other restricted types) don't generate Warning CS8500 #65530
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix serialization of CSharpIdeCodeStyleOptions.Common options #66501
    Area-IDE, Pending director approval
  • Test/implement some aspects of primary constructor parameter capturing. #66499
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors

Merged

  • Ensure no extension method applies to System.Void #66416
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66504
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add workaround for web-tools added design time documents #66453
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Gracefully handle negative endLine and endColumn values for build errors #66458
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Fix stepping UI delays #66450
    Area-Interactive
  • Ensure event handler generation and navigation in webforms works properly #66394
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Adding keyword recommendations after FileKeyword #66357
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Take incremental nullability snapshot for local functions #66406
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66490
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Treat `TypedReference` as managed #66328
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Fix analyzer loading to prefer host #66492
    Area-Compilers
  • Record added node output states as new #61575
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols in C# #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Preserve changes that are still relevant after revert of #66311 #66440
    Area-Compilers
  • Use dictionary lookup while resolving assembly references #66430
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow directories in source generator outputs #66438
    Area-Compilers
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Clean up some checks in FileChangeWatcher.Context.EnqueueWatchingFile #66488
    Area-IDE
  • Nullable annotations for DebugInfoInjector, DynamicAnalysisInjector #66411
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix state for pattern declarations on subsequent iterations #66136
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.6
  • Use `SyntaxReference` instead of `SyntaxNode` in `EmitContext` #66464
    Area-Compilers
  • Emit copy when calling non-readonly method with ref readonly field receiver #66351
    Area-Compilers
  • Different behaviour of discard expression #66309
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.6
  • Add a helper diagnostic for enforcing IDE0005 (remove unnecessary usi… #58835
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Initial support for collection literal parsing. #66417
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for `using alias = any_type`. #50167
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build out infrastructure to share behavior tests between RDF and RDG #46196
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Allow replacing the Blazor NavigationManager using an interface #46193
  • Unskip Source Build job #46191
    8.0-preview2
  • CookieTempDataProvider should not call DeleteCookie just because TempData currently has no values #46189
  • NTLM support for SignalR Java client #46188
  • QuickGrid Filtering Not Refreshing Property #46187
  • [Blazor] @if directive #46186
  • Upgraded PasswordHasher in net 7 causes a security stamp update to occur, which logs users out after 30 minutes #46185
  • [Blazor] InputText component renders invalid html #46183

Closed

  • Add "Heal the Breach" protection to compression middlewares #45662
  • Get an error NETSDK1082 "There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm'." when referencing a Razor Class Library from Blazor Web Assembly App: #46171
  • SignalR android SDK Release note #46168
  • Use specific profile in launchsettings with running dotnet run #46184
  • Access-Control-Allow-Origin not added to response header #46083
  • FileManager Component #46181
  • [Kestrel] HTTPS with ServerCertificateSelector, build full chain every connection, who to cache it? #46117

PullRequests

Created

  • Make it easy to produce a 2.1 build without prodcon #46197
    2.1.x
  • Workaround fabricbot `addMielstone` task issue #46195
    area-infrastructure
  • Add RegexOptions.Compiled option to RegexRouteConstraint #46192
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Named Pipe] Check for pipe broken on WaitConnectionAsync #46182
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement RouteHandlerServices.Map and use in RequestDelegateGenerator #46180
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Remove now-redundant properties from AOT template #46194
    8.0-preview1
  • Skip Source Build for now #46190
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Making `JsonOptions` AOT/Trimmer-safe with EnsureJsonTrimmability switch #45886
    8.0-preview1
  • Update milestone assignments for PRs #46178
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Run test on Linux and Mac #45642
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Added copy parameters to enable parallel build #45779
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • [AOT] Enable analysis and annotate Http.Results #46082
    area-web-frameworks
  • Allow minimal host to be created without default HostBuilder behavior #46040
    area-runtime
  • Add IRateLimiterStatisticsFeature with default implementation and tests #46028
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks
  • feat : Add `StringSyntax` for regex parameters #40589
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • string.Split to Span.Split #46098
    Perf
  • Add DispatchExceptionAsync to ComponentBase #46074
    area-blazor, feature-rendering
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Wait for Request to finish #46176
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Added withServerTimeout and withKeepAliveInterval to HubConnectionBuilder for java client #46172
    area-signalr
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261
  • [Named pipes] Disconnect + delayed client read test cases #46166
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix DictionaryModelBinder null reference issue #45515
    area-web-frameworks
  • Prevent merging PRs which have CI checks run a week+ ago #46177

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update to Microsoft.Data.SqlClient 5.1.0 #30105
  • Any and AnyAsync methods not working. the methods returns false even if the expression should return true #30104
  • Is it possible that SavingChangesAsync will be called again before SavedChangesAsync returns in SaveChangesInterceptor #30103
  • context.Update causes DELETE instead of UPDATE #30102
  • Json: improve JsonElement property access caching in deduplication scenarios #30100

Closed

  • ASP.NET Core 6 session get returns null #30099

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #30028 - Added nullable property to Json mapped model resulting in errors instead of mapping non existing json property to null #30101

Updated

  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response
  • Allow opting out of RETURNING/OUTPUT clauses in SaveChanges #29917
